CHAPTER.VERS: Pasian’ sila le Jesuh Khrih’ sawltak ahi keimah Paul in,Thuzuau a gen ngei lo Pasian in tangtawng pekin thu hong ciamin, a hunhoih a tun ciangin thuhilhna tawh a hong kilatsak nuntak tawntungna thu lametna tawh, Pasian’ teel mite’ upna le thuman thutak a theihna uhah biakna thu tawh kituakin a khan semsem nading thu a hilh dingin eite hong Hon Pasian’ thupiakna tawh nasep hong kipia ahih manin,
Thu upna-ah ka ta taktak ahi Titus tungah lai ka hong khak hi.Pa Pasian le eite hong Hon Khrih Jesuh in nangma tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.

Krete Tuikulh gam sung tengah a manin puahphat ding a kisam lai a omte a sem ding le khua simah pawlpi upa a koih dingin tua gamah a hong nusia ka hi hi. Nang tungah ka hong gensa thute hoihtakin na phawk in:
Upate pen paubaanna a om lote hi dinga, zi khat bek nei-in, a tate zong thu um mi hi-in, a thumang lo, a phengtat gawpte hi lo ding uh hi.
Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo,
zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-uk zo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi le a kisek zo mi hi ding uh hi.
Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uh hi. Tua hileh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite’ khialhna zong laktel thei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu a mang lo, thu a mawk gengen, mi a khem thei, a diakdiakin Jew ngeina bangin vun-at nading thu a gen tampi tak a om uh hi.
Sum ngah theih nading bekin a kilawm lopi-in thu hilhin biakna innkuan buppi nawngkaisak uh ahih manin thu a gen nawn loh nadingun khaktan ding ahi hi.
Amau Krete gam mite sung panin a kamsang uh khat in,“Krete gam mitea zuauthei tawntung,ganhing bangin a gilo,a thadah a uisan mi ahi uh hi,” na ci hi.
Hih ama thugen a man mahmah ahi hi. Tua ahih manin thu upna man nei thei-in,
Jew mite’ tangthu phuahtawmte ahi a, thuman a nial mite’ thupiaknate ahi zongin a don nawn loh nadingun khauhtakin taii-in na thuhilh in.
Lungsim siangthote adingin na khempeuh a siang hi a, ahi zongin thu um lote a lungsim ngaihsutnate uh siakhin ahih manin amaute adingin a siang bangmah om lo hi.
Pasian a thei-in a kigen uh hangin a gamtatnate uh tawh kilehbulh hi. Amaute a muhthadahhuai, a thumang lo, na hoih sem dingin a kilawmna a om lo mite ahi uh hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in upna man tawh a kituak thu na hilh in.

Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikem zo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neih theih nading, itna man a neih theih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuak zawh nadingun na gen in.

Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian’ thu a gensiatkhak loh nadingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahih nading, mi gensiate ahih loh nading, zunek kiphamawhte ahih loh nading, thuhoih thupha hilhin,
amaute sangin a nau zaw nupite in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it nadingun a hilh ding,
thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi le a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahih nadingun na gen in.
Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-uk zawh nadingun na hanthawn pha in.
Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna a kipan thu khempeuh ah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite’ zahtak theih dingin thu na hilh inla,
mite’ mawhmat theih loh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hileh i langte in hong gensiat theih nading mu loin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.
Silate in zong a tote uh thu mangin, thu khempeuh ah a tote uh a lungkimsak nading, a tote uh thu seel loin,
a guktak loh nading, a tawntungin hoih gamtatin a cihtakna uh a kilatsak nadingun na hanthawn in. Tua hileh eite hong Hon Pasian’ thu a hoihna a kilangsakte ahi ding uh ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi.

Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.
I mawhna khempeuh panin hong hon khia ding le ama neihtuam i suah theih nadingin Jesuh a mahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.
Hih ka hong thugente hilh inla, mite taii-in na hanthot ciangin na aana neih teng khempeuh zang kawm in. Mite’ simmawhin om kei in.
Na mite in hong uk kumpite le aana neite’ thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak inla,
kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dik nading uh na gen in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh eite zong nidangin haitatin, thumang loin, vakvai-in, duhna deihna a tuamtuamte thuaklahin, thusia le enna lungsim tawh a gamtate, mite in hong mudahin, eite khatlekhat zong a kimudah ngeite ihi hi.
Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian’ itna le a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin,

amah in eite hong hon khia hi. Eite in na hoih i sep zawhna hangin hong hon khia hi loin eite tungah suahtakna le nuntakna thak a hong pia Kha Siangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong hon khia ahi hi.
Pasian in eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin,
ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.

Hih ka thugente a man mahmah ahi hi.Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu a um mite in gamtat hoih a neih theihna dingun hih ka hong thugente na lim ngaihsut ding ka deih hi. Ka hong thugente a hoih hi a, mite adingin a manpha vive ahi hi.
Ahi zongin a haihuai thu kiseelna, min kigual deudau khangsimna, kitotna, thukham kitotlawhna cihte na pelh in. Tuate a kimanna a om lo, a mawkna thu hi lel hi.
Kitot, kikhen nading a piangsak mite pen khatvei nihvei bang na hilh khit ciangin kisukha nawn vet kei in.
Tua bang mite a kisiakhin hi a, a mawhna un a khialhna uh a kilangsak ahihna thu na thei in.
Artemas ahi a, Tikhikas ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh nang kiangah ka hong paisak ciangin, Nikopolis khua-ah phalbi sung omsawm ka hih manin, kei omna tua khua-ah nong pai theih nadingin hong hanciam in.
Sitni Zenas le Apollos-te a khualzinna uh manlang takin a paisuak theih nadingun na hih theih bangin na huh inla, lamkalah kisapna bangmah a neihkhak loh nading uh zong na thei in.
I mite ommawk loin, thu kisam a phamawhte huh thei-in, na hoih na phate a sep theih nadingun na hilh in.
Kei tawh a om mi khempeuh in nang hong hopih uh hi. Thu upna sungah ei hong itte khempeuh na na hopihsak in.Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.
